values:
so right now im considering buying the iphone.
i really really want it but its not cheap and i would have to pay for my own plan.
i think im going to get it and hopefully soon.

school is going ok.
im having a little trouble with math.
work is alright...i hate it as usual. 

me and joe are better now.
i honestly love him to death and i want to be with him forever.
i cant imagine my life without him. 
out of all the good and bad things we have been through he is the one person who always puts a smile on my face.
we have a lot we need to work on but im willing to take the challenges we face and get through them.

this weekend i work friday and saturday but im hoping to hangout with nicky after work on saturday and maybe a little bit on sunday.
i dont get to see him a lot with his school schedule and my school and work schedules. 


the other day i was thinking about all the friends i have lost over the years and ones i have also gained.
i wouldnt trade anything that has happened over the years because it shows peoples true colors.
i also put so much guilt and blame on myself for the way things are but im finally realizing that im not to blame at all.
i am a great friend and a great person.
anyone who cant see that can screw themselves.
the only person who has seen that and stuck by me through all these years is joe. yea he broke my heart and yea i broke his heart to but he has always stuck by my side and that counts for a lot.
i am who i am and if people dont like that its fine.
because i dont always like everyone either.
im happy im not like the friends i have lost.
because deep down i am such a better person then them overall.
it makes me happy to know these things.
its so true when they say keep your friends close and your enemies closer.
true friends are hard to find these days.

yay i finally have the day off with no school or work.
i slept in today until 12 and it felt sooo good.
i just took a shower and im getting ready to go get my nails done.


i am so frustrated with me and joe.
tonight we made plans to go to a erebus but of course joe wants to change the plans and go hunting.
he just went hunting two weekends ago. 
he knows that if he goes im going to be mad....yea stupid i know.
im not going to tell him what to do and if he wants to go he can go.
im just fed up with him always ruining or screwing up plans that we make together.
its like im not important enough to spend time with.
its plain bullshit.
hunting is more important than his own girlfriend. hes going hunting in november for 5 days and leaving me again.
hes always leaving me and doing things on his own...and thats fine but it hurts to always be left in the dust.
he doesnt understand how anything he does affects me and thats selfish.
were in this serious relationship that has been going on for almost 4 years now and things are still petty like this.
i hate when he leaves me for the weekend or blows me off...why do i even put up with it?
i dont want to have another bump in our relationship.
i just wish joe would take my feelings into consideration and feel lucky that he has me.
im so grateful i have him and i love him to death.
i mean it when i say that he is the person i want to marry and spend the rest of my life with.
who knows if that will happen tho....i will not be unhappy and i will not ruin my life just to please him.
i deserve to be happy and i deserve to have a boyfriend that appreciates me and loves me uncondtionally....i used to have that...WHAT THE FUCK HAPPENED.
i still have that spark with him when were together and when we kiss but if that enough to save a relationship...im honestly not sure anymore. 
i am so attatched to joe and i take our relationship seriously but im am trying so hard to change that. 
im going to not make it so serious and im going to pull away. so when he leaves me and dissappoints me i wont be hurt.
i wont set my self up for devastation anymore. 

i love him with all my heart.

i havent updated in forever.
ive been so busy with school and work its craaazzy.
i go to school all day tuesday and thursdays and then i have one class on mondays and wednesdays.
then i usually work monday and wednesday and friday saturday and sunday.
ocasionally i get one of those days off.
my classes are ok except math.
i hate it....i hate having the class early in the morning and its just soo boring. 
i have been feeling so stressed lately from school and work.
i work the days i dont have school and the days i dont work i have school all day sooo i barely get time to myself anymore. 
another thing thats been bugging me is that my last class on tuesday and thursdays doesnt end tll like 7:30/8 and on monday and wednesday i work till 9:30 soo i dont get to see joe till later at night and were both so tired we go to bed early. also joe doesnt work weekends anymore and i always do....so i feel like we dont get to spend much time together anymore.
i just feel like all my life consists of is school and work and i absolutely hate it.
i dont want next semster to be like this but i know its going to be because it works for my school and work schedule.

last weekend i did take a few hours and i just sat in my basement and drew and painted while listening to my itunes playlist. it was so relaxing and so nice. i wish i had more days like that.
so everything with joe has been amazing lately except for the fact that he falls asleep on me almost everynight. im sick of it.

yesterday evening i went over my auntie paulas house.
we ate dinner then we went for a walk.
we walked 4.8 miles and it felt sooo damn good.
we talked a lot and it was really nice.
today i hung out with jackie all day.
i went with her to get her nose pierced then me jackie and my brother went to eat at pepperoni grille.
a little after my aunt got home from work we went and played tennis for a few hours.
it was soooo much fun. i loved it.
then i came home and talked to joe and he ruined my night once again.

i love that kid to death but i dont even feel like were together anymore.
i have been trying soooo hard to make things better and you can only try so hard until everything fails.
i hate feeling unhappy and angry everyday.
i want to wake up everyday and know that i have someone that loves me and wants me unconditionally.
i want to feel like i have that special someone to go to whenever i need them.
i want to be with someone who cares and puts effort in and works on the relationship.
i want to be 100% happy.
but i guess you dont always get what you want.

ahhhhhh i hate this.

yesterday was such a god day.
good day at school.
good intervew.
good time with jarek.
and good time visiting nicky and auntie cindie.
then i came home and talked to joe.
just because he had a bad day and was crabby he had to take it out on me.
amy came over and we had a good time watching grey's anatomy and the girl next door.
but i still went to bed angry and upset.

i woke up this morning with a craving for dairy queen.
mmmm yummy.
and now im sitting here thinking.
i am so unhappy right now with a lot of things. 
and im trying really hard to make those things better and be happy.
im trying to better my self as a person physically and emotionally.
im trying to make things better with joe.
im trying to build back friendships.
and im trying to make new ones.
but every once in a while i get a day like today when i feel so alone and discouraged.
i feel like im the only one trying..
i love joe so much and we have been through a lot but things arent getting any better.
hes not trying.
he doesnt seem to care.
sometimes it makes me think we should just break up even though i dont want to.
im sick of crying and yelling and feeling like i dont have him as mine.
i dont know what to do anymore.

there are no words to describe how much nicky means to me.
he is my rock and my bestfriend.
i wish that we were the same age and he was out of highschool and that i could see him like everyday.
i love that kid to death.

i have an interview at jcpenny's today. 
im excited.
today has been a good day so far.
school was pretty good.
i had a presentation in business that went easier then i thought it was going to,
and a math test i think i did alright on even tho it will prolly be the lowest score on any of the math tests i have taken this semester because i cant simplify radicals but it doesnt matter anyway because my teacher throws out our lowewst test grade and on the 3 other tests we have taken i got 96% 95% and 90% so im good.
i love to drive by myself and blast my music as loud as ever and sing along so i look like an idiot. 
those are some of the times when i feel the most content. 
the weather today puts a smile on my face.
:) smile.

i took a bath tonight.
to relax, to think.
i thought a lot.
this summer i am going to dedicate all my time to working, exercising, and doing art projects. 
working=money 
exercising=makes me feel good.
art projects=make me feel content and secure.
fuck hanging out.
fuck making plans.
fuck disappointment. 
fuck fakeness.
fuck it all.

im thinking that i set my hopes way to high
because i always get let down and disappointed in the end.

these years are supposed to be the best.
i want to live my life to the fullest and be totally happy.
but why the fuck is it soooo hard.
happiness is what you make of it.
im trying, im really trying...but its to the point where ive given up.

how can such an amazing and enjoyable day turn to such a let down.
ive seriously realized how important my cousins and aunts are to me.
nicky, auntie paula, and auntie cindie...true in everyway possible.
no matter what i do i always have fun with them.
when i laugh with them is true.
any other time its fake.
what can i say...life is a journey. 
my journey needs to change.

i love my life right now.
today was just an amazing day.
my hair was straight and looked great.
i talked to nicky for like an hour about everything.
my night was adventurous and soo fun.
im waiting for joe to come over.
i got new stuff to wear snowmobiling...snow pants, coat, and gloves...all i need is boots.
and the gear got is soooo sawwweet.
i love my cats...they are the best and sooo cute.
my color and design2 class is going soooo good.
i love my teacher and i love my projects i have done so far.
my brother and i are getting along somewhat more cuz of taking that art class together.
i love the exercise class my mom and i are taking.
its fun and it feels great to work out.
we are going up north to snowmobile in 1 week.
i am sooo excited.
joe and my auntie paula are coming for sure.
there might be 13 of us up there if everyone goes.
its gonna be fun.
i cant wait to get away from home.
i only have been working like 1-2 days a week. which is kinda bad cuz i need money.
i am living life one day at a time and loving it.
tomorrow night i am hanging out with krista and we might go to the club.
woot. woot. <-----  i have been saying that a lot lately.
i updated my ipod and its organized to perfection.
i love it.





Living For Today And Not Tomorrow's Satisfaction

well i noticed that i havent updated in a while.
things have been pretty good.
this week has been very stressful and a little fucked up.
i work now and its alright i guess.
joe has been pissing me off lately.
we have such good days and then we have bad days and i cant help but get sooo pissed at him.
princess has been having seizures really bad and we took her to the vet today.
he said as long as her medicine is constant the seizures will be controlled.
and i hope hes right becuase i hate seeing her seizure. 
christmas is in a few days.
im excited.
thats all i have to say right now.

last weekend i went up north.
my gramma and papa were already up there so friday night my mom my brother my auntie paula and me headed up there.
it was a awesome weekend.
i had so0o0o000o much fun and was laughing constantly.
this week has been the same as most.
this weekend joe went hunting in indiana with his dad.
i have been hanging out with josh a lot lately.
we went tanning the other day and got kinda burnt.
our faces were so red but joshs was worse than mine.
so this weekend was pretty fun.
friday i went to the movies with jimmy josh and my brother.
we went to see saw 3.
it was pretty good but i liked the first 2 better.
after that we waited for george to get off work and then we all went and played laser tag.
laser tag was soo0o much fun even tho i lost.
i would do it again in a heartbeat.
then we had to take jimmy home.
after that we went to eat at  dennys then to meijers.
it was a very fun night.
saturday i hung out with jackie and nicky.
we went and visited brad at subway then hung around my house.
nicky spent the night and once brad got home from work josh came over and we went to eat at big boys.
we were gonna go bowling but decided not to.
and now today i plan on going tanning with josh then i have homework to work on.
i have like no motivation lately to do my homework.
its not good.
i registered 3 of my classes for next semester and i need one more and i cant find anything i want to take.
joe comes home tonight and i cant wait to see him.
i missed him this weekend.
next weekend should be fun cuz joes not going away and i think his parents are leaving...soo party.
also josh might be having a hotel party.
ashleys b-day is friday...but idk if her parents are gonna let her hangout. hopefully they do.
i love being busy and having fun.

last thursday i went to the haunted house "erebus" with josh ashley and joe.
it wasnt really scary but the effects were sweet.
i loved it.
this past weekend was very enjoyable.
i went to nickys for the weekend.
chris and brad spent the night there saturday night.
saturday during the day we went to blakes cider mill.
and later on my aunt died my hair. she did a wonderful job. 
my hair is a lot darker than i anticipated.
but i like it a lot.
monday afternoon i went and put in a few applications.
later at night i went to the movies with joe and josh.
we saw "step up"....good movie.
toinight i am going to the movies again with josh ashley and joe to see texas chainsaw massacre (the beginning).
it should be a sweet movie.
then thursday or friday josh joe ashley and me are planning on going to another haunted house. we want to go to "the fear factory".
then this weekend i am going to my auntie paulas.
saturday night i am supposed to go to a party/bonfire with joe ryan and marie.
that should be fun.
btw last night i saw jenny newman. 
i havent seen her in so long. 
it was nice to see her again and we are planning on hanging out soon.





while im out there getting where im getting to
i know somebody out there loves me

this past weekend was amazing.
i had so much fun up north.
me and brooke rode the 4 wheeler non stop.
oh and the trackter to.
i cant believe how much snow was up there.
it was crazy.
im glad i decided to go because i ended up not wanting to leave.
the new addition to the cabin is sweet.
its like a house now.
i love it.
i hope that we go up there a lot more cuz i love it.
i just hate thats its like 3 1/2- 4 hours away but being up there is so relaxing and so fun.
i love the smell of up north.

tonight was my last english class.
yipeeee.
one less class i have to go to and less homework i have to do.
so glad its over.

the rest of my week is classes and homework.
also spending lots of time with my love, joe.
we are so amazing right now.
last night was so nice.
i really love him now.
these changes we both have taken in ourselves has made our relationship so much better.
i am hanging out with jimmy today.
we are talking about what we are going to do right now.
possibly a movie.
thursday...haunted house with joe and some friends.
then friday and the weekend...nickys.
my aunt is gonna die my hair and we are going to plan something to do saturday.
then i promised my auntie paula i would spend the nite soon so i might be going over there next weekend.
i love being busy.
i also love the rascal flatts.

"there you are
standing strong
holding on"

yesterday brad and i talked for a while.
it was great.
he somewhat understands me now.

im going up north this weekend...yay.
i cant believe its snowing today.
i dont want to go outside in it.
if theres enough snow up north maybe we can snowmobile.

i missed my class this morning.
i set my alarm wrong.
haha o well.

next weekend is gonna be busy.
plans as of now are 
go to my aunt cindies.
dye my hair.
cider mill with cousins.
go to my aunt paulas.
spend time with jimmy.
go to a haunted house.
love it.



i am untouchable.




"You can say what you have to say
cuz my mind's made up anyway
all that bullshit you talk might work a lot
but it's not gonna work today"

i hate change.
but this change is good.
a lot of good things have come from this so far and i only see it getting better from here on.
me and joe are amazing.
nicky is the best cousin anyone could ever ask for.
my mom and i are on good terms.
i can actually talk to her about  lot of things now.
my brother and me see a lot of eachother and we fight but we constantly laugh at stupid little things everyday.
i love my aunite paula she is an amazing person.
she is so good to talk to and spend time with.
shes keeps me laughing.
i am so proud of her for what she has been going through.
my aunt cindie is great to confide in.
she gives great advice.
im so thankful that she lets nicky hang out with me and brad all the time.
i love e-mailing mrs rogers and mrs walker.
they are great people.
things just seem to be moving along wonderfully.
today i had a psych. test and i think i did really good on it.
i also had an interview today which went very well.
im waiting for a call back but im not 100% sure i want the job.
ill end up taking it tho cuz it pays great.
it feels so good to be happy and know that everything is alright.
no one can take these things away from me...no one.
i feel as if im untouchable.
nothing can hurt me right now.
its a nice feeling.


"im changing from the inside out
that was then and this is now"

best friend:  the one friend who is closest to you
                    : a person whom one knows, likes, and trusts
                    : not just anyone
                    : someone who knows you inside and out
                    : nicky and joe




Lake Port State Park
Halloween weekend 2006





Carving Pumpkins.


Brooke Shelby and Michael all dressed up.


Me and Nicky...haha.


My pumpkin I carved.


Nicky's pumpkin.


Joe and me.


Nicky and Auntie Paula.


Nicky and me.


Lake Huron.


Lake Huron.


Lake Huron and the beach.


Joe and Nicky in the trails.


One of the many trails.

I loved this weekend.
It was so much fun.
It just went by to fast.





Btw....my new favorite drink...life water.

these past few days have been sweet.


went to a hooka bar with amy n cody. fun fun.


went to the movies with amy cody n rob. tons of fun.

spent time with nicky. i love him to death.

went to the renaissance festival. hilarious.

now off to my cousin chris's to spend the night at his new house with nicky and brad.

yay.

i have had so much fun this week.

i love when nicky sings random songs.

i love when amy swears.

and i love when brad dances.

i am going to make time for jimmy this week.

i am getting really sick of school but it is going good.

i love when he spends the night with me.
i cant fall asleep without him anymore.

i did my hair straight a few times this week and i loved it.

he asked me to come visit him in montana.
he said he would pay half.
it would be so cool if that actually worked out.
idk how my mom or joe would feel about it tho.

i love my tv shows and it makes me relaxed and happy watching them.




every now and then i dream of something wild.
HE FUCKEN PISSES ME OFF!

tonight i am babysitting my cousin and her friend.
i really dont feel like it but i need the extra money.

i wish my cousin nicky didnt have his homecoming tonight.
i wanted to hangout with him longer today.
yesterday was his birthday and i spent time with him.
it was really nice.
we went over my aunt paulas for a while.
i hope one weekend soon i can go stay with her.

i feel like im missing something in my life but i dont know what it is.
suddenly im not as happy as i was last week. 
its weird.

im starting to not have faith in a lot of things.
i need a getaway.
thank god camping is coming soon.
it will give me lots of time to think and i really hope jordon comes to visit because i love talking to him. 
hes a great listener and acutally cares.
he is one of the few people i can open up to.

i have been e-mailing mrs rogers lately and she is another one of the few people i can open up to.
she cares and gives great advice.
im glad i formed a bond with her.






NO ONE knows me better than you
and NO ONE knows you better than me
^^^^
i love you nicky.
i hope you had a great birthday.

im happy i decided to come home.
i like my classes and i like home.
i just always have so much homework.
i hate that.
i love my friends and hanging out with them.
lunches with amy on tuesdays and thursdays are great.
the only thing i need right now is a job.
i want the money but i really dont want to work.
i dont want to add a whole lotta stress in my life but i need a job and i want my mom to stop bitching at me about it.
me and joe are happy again.
my birthday is in 3 days.
ill be 18. yay...i guess.
most teenagers want to be older but i want to be younger.
i loved being a little kid.
no worries and no stress.
when my dad was here.
loving life and smiling everyday.
if i could go back i would in a heart beat.
thursday i went to a styx and foreigner concert.
i wasnt to excited at first but it was an amazing concert.
i loved it and im so glad i went.

 

 

 

"I feel so alone in the night, scared to open my eyes"

so this is not for me at all.
this is not where i want to be.
this is a awesome place to visit and party but not to live for 9 months.
i am very  thankful to have this opportunity buts its not for me.


i was at a very low point quite a while ago.
and just recently i started feeling happy again.
i dont want to go back to being unhappy again and thats what i feel like here...just unhappy.


i cant be away from home like this.
i cant do it.


my mom is coming here today with my aunt to drop off my cousins desk and to talk with me.
i have a new plan of what i want to do.
i want to go home and i hope my mom lets me.

i am leaving for state in 8 days. 
i cant even explain all the emoitons running through me.
i still wonder if i am doing the right thing.
i am so scared. even more scared than excited.
i am trying so hard to leave with an open mind but its challenging.
i cant help but cry every night.

all my roommates are older than me. by 3-4 years.
i dont really seem to have very much in common with any of them.
im wondering if i should try and change rooms.
i dont want to be quick to judge but i know i will be going through different emotions then them being that this is my first time going away and they have already been through this and i dont want to feel alone.
i know i will meet a lot of new people.
i just dont know if im ready for it.

everyday that passes gets a little more cheerless.

last night i went walking with my aunt paula jackie and my mom.
today i went rollerblading with joe and nicky. 
it was very relaxing and stress free.
i loved it.

JOURNEY. 
DEF LEPPARD.
TONIGHT.
SO EXCITED.
:)

so haas lake was a blast.
i miss it so much.
we passed it today on the way to my msu orientation.
i wanted to cry.
so many memories and so many pictures.
i will go back there again before summer is over.

my last day of work was saturday.
damn it feels so good.
i am still going to help annie out and do inventory tho.
megan and rob said they would do inventory to.

right now i am at my msu orientation.
they pile you with information all day long.
i am so tired right now.
today was pretty fun.
the rooms we stay over night in are hot as hell tho...no air conditioning...it sux.
and we had to walk this long ass walk from our residence hall back to case hall.
i live in akers so it was a long long walk on a hot hot day.
i will admit i do feel home sick right now.
i miss my bed and my room already.
and of course i miss my cats to death.
i havent even been away that long...i dont know how i am going to do it in the fall.
i hope that tomorrow goes by smooth and that i get home in the early afternoon so i still have part of the day to enjoy to myself.


right now im just a huge bundle of many different emotions
and my only reaction is to cry.
im trying to be strong.

so two days ago i found out that my boss, store manager, and friend,-tracy-got fired from work.
i was so surprized.
they had no real reason for firing her so they made up some bullshit.
i talked to tracy the day she got fired and she told me she had to move back up north.
so that means i dont know when ill see her again or her kids, who i used to babysit.
i am so sad and i feel so bad for tracy.
i hope the everything works out for her.

i let my work know that my last day will be july 15th.
it was supposed to be august 5th but with everything going on i want to leave earlier.
i am so happy.
i have one week of paid vacation coming up. sunday july 2nd to saturday july 8th. so that whole week i will be up at haas lake and not have to work.
yay.
when i get back i only have to work one week and then im done with it.



i can not wait for haas lake.
i am so excited.
my best friends are gonna be up there with me and some of my family to.
i also get to see lots of people i havent seen in a year.
im gonna take lots of pictures and cherish my time away from home and work.
: )
ARMD 4 LIFE

Tomorrow And Sunday...
We's Gonna Party!

i went to cedar point this past weekend with megan vanessa rudy and some of megans family.
we went to soak city and cedar point both.
it was so much fun.|
we rode all the roller coasters except 3.
i loved the millennium force.
me and megan bought are picture from the millennium force.
its funny.


i have to work everyday this week cept monday, saturday, and sunday because i requested those days off.
tina from my work got fired so i am picking up some of her hours and it kinda sucks. 
i need the money but i dont wanna work every fucken day.
i hate work now that tina is gone.
she shouldnt have even got fired.
the whole situation is bullshit.
she is the only person at my work that i truely trusted and liked a lot.
almost everyone else is dumb and talk shit about everyone.
i absolutely hate annie.
im glad im leaving soon cuz of college.
tracy took her kids up north for the summer so i dont have to babysit them anymore.
im gonna miss them but i will admit sometimes they did get on my nerves.











i live for those secret nights.

yesterday is the only day off i have this week...between work and babysitting.
i still hang out after work cuz its not like i work that late but i hate work.
wednesday was soooo damn busy. i cut my finger and it hurt like a bitch.
yesterday was soo fun.
i hadnt seen megan in so long and we hung out yesterday.
it was amazing being with my two best friends.
it sux that amy had to go to work.
but tonite is gonna be fun.
i gotta work and so does amy but after megan and amy are spending the night.
and of course i promised megan i would take her driving and parking so she can practice for her road test thats coming up.
last night after dropping megan off rob couldnt find his keys and he realized he locked them in his van.
so there were no windows open at all and all the doors were locked.
rob was trying to pull on this one window and it just shattered into pieces.
we had to clean up all the glass and now he is missing a window.
i feel so bad for him but he needs to get a spare key to his car.

the summer has just begun and i feel like its going by way to fast.
this weekend i have my graduation ceremony, grad parties, and babysitting.
next weekend is cedar point with megan.
damn im excited.
the next weekend is my grad party, amys grad party, and many more.
this summer needs to slow down.
every day that goes by is one more day closer to me leaving for msu.
i am scared out of my mind.
i dont wanna leave.




THE JOURNEY CONCERT IS COMING UP!

today i am going camping at lakeport.
i am so excited.
i get to see some dudes that i havent seen in a long long time.
my cousin brooke is going out there for the weekend to.
we are staying with my gramma cuz my dumb mom didnt make reservations for us to camp out there with our camper.
i am so excited. 
i have high hopes for this weekend.

i miss megan and amy sooo damn much.
this whole week i babysat and worked so i couldnt hang out at all.
